svg.text: View Analytics Use Case
Use Case Specification
Use Case Name:
View Analytics
Actor(s):
Admin User
Description:
Comprehensive analytics dashboard providing match statistics, user engagement metrics,
performance indicators, and system health monitoring for administrative oversight.
Preconditions:
1. Admin must be logged in with analytics access permissions
Main Flow:
1. Admin navigates to Matches section from admin dashboard
2. System displays comprehensive match analytics dashboard
3. System shows key metrics: total matches, completion rates, participation averages
4. System displays sport-wise analytics with popularity rankings
5. System provides match creation trends with time-based visualizations
6. System shows match status distribution: active, completed, cancelled
7. System displays user engagement metrics and activity patterns
8. System provides venue utilization statistics and booking patterns
9. Admin can filter analytics by date range, sport type, or user demographics
10. System generates exportable reports for external analysis
11. System provides real-time data updates and refresh capabilities
Alternative Flows:
A1. Custom date range: Admin selects specific time periods for analysis
A2. Export data: Admin downloads analytics data in various formats (CSV, PDF)
A3. Drill-down analysis: Admin explores detailed metrics for specific categories
A4. Comparative analysis: Admin compares metrics across different time periods
A5. Alert thresholds: Admin sets up automated alerts for metric changes
A6. Dashboard customization: Admin configures preferred metrics and layouts
